archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L2)(oar) PM1. Manage Process & Product performance
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: -Cost (WIP), Quality, (On time Quality) Time (on time delivery, Lead Time...) - shop floor product flow (workload, load balancing) - Simulate the preparation processes (Assemble, machining, Quality) - Analyze the global development consumption (carbon emission, energy, raw materials, â€¦)
